title: (48215) Iurreta - 3 Olalde Kalea
description: Larger car park for cars and motorhomes also used at night. Has enough free spaces for a break or an overnight stay while passing through.

title: (48200) Durango - 1B Lugar Grupo Santikurutz Auzoa
description: Public parking next to the cemetery and the Zuhatzola park. The park has a children's play area and a fenced area for dogs. Close to the old town, supermarket and shops within walking distance.

title: (48215) Iurreta - Olalde Kalea, 3C
description: Free parking next to the road, much of it flat, is not specific for motorhomes but they enter without problems, a bit noisy on the road that passes by but you can spend the night.

title: (48215) Iurreta - 1 Andaparape Kalea
description: Good parking to rest. The night is quite empty. There is a fountain in the square and toilets on the church side.

title: (48200) Durango - 9 Urki Kalea
description: Parking behind some cottages, usually vans and motorhomes, water point and playground.

title: (48200) Durango - 6 Calle Bustintza Kalea
description: Parking where there are always motorhomes and some weekends, 10 minutes from downtown.

title: (48215) Durango - 20G Lugar Grupo Padureta
description: Quiet parking to sleep. Quiet place with many services. In the background, there is always a camper. Insurance

title: (48200) Durango - 52 Tabira Kalea
description: Quiet parking in the Tabira neighborhood of Durango. Next to the river and the church. There is a nice park. It is also an area to walk with dogs

title: (48215) Iurreta - 16 Iurreta Auzoa
description: Parking next to the Durango-Iurreta tollbooth, somewhat noisy due to the proximity of the highway but it can be a quick stop to rest if you are on the A8. there is a galibo fence but vans come in too much. There is also a bus stop to Bilbao next to the car park and it can be practical to visit the capital by public transport.

title: (48220) Traña-Matiena - 5C Kalea Arzubia
description: Large parking There are usually motorhomes and small trucks parked. Close to coffee shops. Quiet zone.

title: (48220) Abadiño - 38 Astola Auzoa
description: Quiet and near Durango. Swimming pools at a hundred meters, greenway that connects Abadiano and Durango, barbecue area and a fountain. In summer there are toilets for public use.

title: (48213) Izurtza - 9Y Elizalde Auzoa
description: Parking in a residential area behind some chalets, quiet and safe. near a fountain next to the church and a small public park with exercise machines. good place to start a pleasant walk along the Mañaria river or routes to the urkiola natural park.

title: (48215) Iurreta - 13C Lugar Barrio Santa Maña
description: Beresi recreation area Area with tables, barbecues, swings and a soccer field. Parking is in the adjacent industrial estate, you cannot park in the picnic area. Be careful, with a west wind unpleasant odors can come from nearby industries...

title: (48215) Orozketa -
description: Little traveled place. Perfect area to enjoy nature and good views. You can take a nice walk around.

title: (48220) Abadiño - 3 Solozobal Kalea
description:
Parking at the back of the Basque ball center (local sports center)
Quiet, with the possibility of visiting the area and spending the night.
Bike lane throughout the area.

title: (48200) Garai - 19A Lugar Barrio San Migel
description: A nice place. A small town with beautiful views. It has a fountain and a playground for children. Views of Mont Oiz. Ideal for visiting Duranguesado or starting a route to Oiz. The city has two bars. I recommend visiting the church area, the viewpoint of the square and the hermitage of San Juan with spectacular views of Duranguesado.

title: (48220) Abadiño - 17A Muntsaratz Auzoa
description: Quiet area to spend the night. Fountain nearby. Roads to make bike routes. Green area. Mendings at 150m. 2 bars nearby

title: (48212) Mañaria - 18 Aldebarrena Auzoa
description: Drinking Spring Water.

title: (48215) Yurreta - 19 Fauste Auzoa
description: It is a gas station with showers.

title: (48200) Durango - 7 Santa Lucia Auzoa Auzoa
description: Picnic area with tables and barbecue area, non-potable water. Option of hiking and climbing area. Parking area with overnight option

title: (48200) Goierri - 50 Lugar Barrio Goierri
description: Picnic area, uneven ground.

title: (48220) Bilbao - 23C Lugar Barrio Mendiola
description: Ample parking, perfect for motorhomes and large volume vehicles, pleasant shade most of the day, quiet place without problems, no type of services, garbage containers 1 kilometer before arriving, next to the road. After the bridge, you may have problems if your vehicle is a large volume or a motorhome. Perfect place to start your climbs or excursions in the Atxarte valley.

title: (48220) Mendiola - Unnamed Road
description:
Climbers car park for the Atxarte range. Great walls for all climbing abilities.

Completely silent and just before the vehicle restriction so no passing traffic at all. 

No data on T-mobile but starlink is at 240mb down.

The final 200m of driving is very steep, watch out in older vehicles! There is also a lower parking area if you don't wish to brave the hill.

title: (48240) Berriz - A Garai Errepidea
description: At the foot of the OIZ. Balcony of Bizkaia. 2 places in grassy area in front of the Refuge. With table and benches in the shade. Non-drinking fountain and bbq next to Refugio.

title: (48250) Zaldibar - 28A Lugar Barrio Gazaga
description: Picnic area and place to spend the night.

title: (48250) Zaldibar - 3B Plaza San Martin
description: It is a small parking in a back area of the town like a small polygon but at the same time next to the town at about 200 / 300m a bit noisy since the highway passes at about 50 or 100m at night

title: (48141) Vizcaya - Unnamed Road
description:
Like it remote? Well you asked for it.. This is THE place to wake up to in the morning :) 
On gravel roadside going to national park. So far 6 cars went by so not very busy road at all :) 
Get here with day light as it's tricky to park. Place for 3 campers.

title: (48381) Munitibar-Arbatzegi Gerrikaitz - 65 Gerrikaitz Auzoa
description:
In the Oiz Wind Farm, going up a paved cement road that is not in bad condition and in fact it goes up quite well except for a small landslide near the end, although it is not a problem. The climb is very steep, I don't know how it would go up with a motorhome but with a van without problem, the views are spectacular. The noise of the windmills if you are next to them is a bit annoying but inside the van and parked next to the Hermitage it does not bother and is almost negligible. Iberdrola cars passed by at night and in the morning but nobody said anything to us or bothered us. It also has an area with tables and inside the Hermitage there is a place to barbecue and sit.
PLEASE KEEP IT CLEAN

title: (48250) - 24DUP Barrio Goierri
description: Picnic area

title: (48211) Bizkaia - 9F Lugar Barrio Urkiola
description: Nice place near the road, tables and grills and a fountain further in the park

title: (48211) Urkiola - 9C Lugar Barrio Urkiola
description: A large concrete car park, set across three tiers, at the Sanctuary at Urkiola. Slope is noticeable but tolerable. Toilets and taps in Refugio building (open 09:30-18:30) below lowest tier of car park.

title: (48291) Santiago - Unnamed Road
description: Surprising place above a road but hidden in a small dead end road in nature. ideal for an extra night even if the noise of the cars is heard but it calms down around 11 p.m. great landscape facing the sea and the city. 2 minutes drive from town. walk to the end of the small dirt road for 200m. No passage of spurs or other cars so alone in the world!

title: (48211) Abadiño - 11 Urkiola Auzoa
description: Urkiola recreational area. It has tables, barbecues and a fountain. There are also swings. Plenty of parking.

title: (48269) - 1QUI Lugar Barrio Gerea
description: Trabakuako jatetxetako aparkalekuak. Gabaz oso bakartia Trabakua restaurant parking lot. At night it's so lonely

title: (48230) Elorrio - 10B Kalea San Jose
description: Motorhome area with all services. The machine works with Jeton. 100 liters or 1 hour of light. Children's playground, tables, wooded area with shade

title: (48230) Elorrio - 4 Argiñeta etorbidea
description: Ecolaundry Laundry. Hours from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (48230) Elorrio - 11D Kalea Nizeto Urkizu
description: Central parking without services

title: (48141) - 1 Baltzola Auzoa
description: Parking next to a hermitage. Surrounded by forest and several trails. Baltzola caves are 20 min walk.

title: (48291) Atxondo - Elizondo Plaza
description: Beautiful parking to park both day and night very quiet and also very close to an organic food restaurant

title: (48211) Abadiño - 4 BI-623
description: Park for a day in peace, by the side of the road. It is a natural reserve, so overnight is prohibited. There is 1 sink nearby and picnic tables. At 150 m, on the other side of the road, is a large picnic area with drinking water. We stayed here for 2 nights, right next to a wastebasket, there is some noise on the road, but that does not bother. 20 minutes walk from the sanctuary of Urkiola and 1h 30 'if you want to make the summit, Urkiolaguirre. TO RESPECT THE ENVIRONMENT.

title: (48382) Albiz - BI-3231
description: As name said... just to spend a while

title: (48141) BI - 1 Baltzola Auzoa
description: Parking on the side of the road. Warning! If the soil is wet, it may not be accessible. There is sometimes a lot of heavy machinery, but it offers a magnificent view. A little further, there is a little grass on a flat ground and some trees to hang hammocks. Please keep clean. The inhabitants are very flammable. Thank you 1 parking place on the side of the road, if the land is married, access can be difficult. Woodworking machines arriving a few times. The path goes down (walk only) to a nice flat place and trees to hang hammocks. Please be clean.

title: (48211) Abadiño - 2 BI-623
description: Place ready for the road but enough to spend a night, there is a toilet a barbecue and place for a lot of trucks

title: (48340) Etxano - 8 Dudea Auzoa
description: Small parking in charming village and beautiful mountain views from the parking lot. Very peaceful

title: (48340) - 4 Lugar Barrio Ibarra
description: Parking Jauregibarria next to the park and the restaurant. Next to others who appear in this app, but more enjoyable, I think. Fountains next to the park restaurant and terrace.

title: (48291) Atxondo - 12 Artecalle Kalea
description: Flat land under trees with water point. near busy road. rather for van.

title: (48340) Amorebieta-Etxano - 11 Jauregibarria Auzoa
description: Our facility is synonymous with comfort and pleasure, and is situated just a few metres away from the Grand Palais and city centre.

title: (48260) Ermua - Betiondo Kalea
description: A paved parking lot, full of greenery and with a source of drinking water. There is an area where you can exercise and an area prepared to take the dog.

title: (48141) Indusi - 6 Indusi Auzoa
description: Indusi Parking. Next to several routes of initiation to climbing (IV). Next to a small chapel, with shady areas and at the edge of the river. Very calm.

title: (48340) Amorebieta-Etxano - 4 Herriko Plaza
description:
Self-service laundry room with three washing machines and two dryers.
Hours from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m. non-stop.
Soaps and softeners included.
It works with money.
Any questions, call!

title: (48340) Amorebieta-Etxano - 2A Ibaizabal Kalea
description: Parking within the town, small, but taking a good spot parallel to the river is perfect for spending the night. With a source of drinking water a few meters from the parking lot.

title: (48278) Ziortza-Bolibar - BI-4401
description: Parking of the monastery. Ask the authorization of the monk in charge of the pilgrims of Compostela. Level, quiet, visit the monastery and departures of hiking trails.

title: (48260) Ermua - 12 Zeharkale
description: Site to wash clothes. Laundry.

title: (48392) Muxika - 12 Urgozo Bidea
description: Parking at the Zugastieta (Muxika) train stop. About 20 car parks.

title: (48141) - 6E Kalea Ugarana
description: Parking next to the road and truck parking. At night, little traffic, except for the exit of a truck. The squares are small and level. We went to the other parking lot which is close but we didn't find it and we slept here.

title: (48260) Berano - 22 Markina Errepidea
description: It is a road that goes up to a natural swimming pool which operates from June to September. There are tables for eating and the possibility of making a grill. There is trash and you can be with the dog. You can sleep but on the way to the pool there to look for a flat area where you can stay if there are not too many inequalities. But it is not a perfect place to spend the day in summer.

title: (48381) Munitibar-Arbatzegi Gerrikaitz - 51 Barrio Gerrikaitz
description: Parking just off the road next to graveyard. Probably best suited to small/medium sized vans due to narrow parks. No signs prohibiting overnight stays, although we only stopped for a day break. Nice views of the town, and I think there is a walk path into town from the car park

title: (48260) Ermua -
description: Source of drinking water with easy access. There are also tables with the possibility of sleeping there.

title: (48340) Autzagana - 4 Autzagane Auzoa
description: There are several rest areas on the disused main road, where you can spend the night comfortably and quietly. There is a restaurant nearby.

title: (48340) Autzagana - 4Y Autzagane Auzoa
description: Day/night parking, restaurant right in front. planes can be heard from Bilbao airport quite late in the evening, but the night afterwards is quiet. the ideal being to ask permission to park at the hostel (principle of courtesy) and why not have a meal or breakfast there. it seems to me that the parking is public but the configuration is ambiguous.

title: (48141) - 1 Arkaola Auzoa
description: Quiet place without services. It has tables and bbq. Next to an old airfield.

title: (48279) Ziortza-Bolibar - 5 Berezipe Kalea
description: Parking at Ziozka-Bolibar just in front of the cemetery, by the roadside, few passages at night. Sewer access.

title: (48381) Biscay - 8 Kalea Olabarri
description: Nice little place with a couple of bars. with a hiking app you can also wander through the woods along a river. super ok and quiet for one night.

title: (48141) Bizkaia - 1A Lugar Barrio Montebideo
description: Beautiful tree area to eat and rest. Water and Bathrooms. Huge expanse with grass

title: (01165) Aramaio - 2A Barrio Oleta
description: Parking in the middle of nature, a very quiet place. Starting point for excursions to the Sierra de Urkiola. No phone coverage .

title: (48392) Muxika - BI635
description: Ground parking where you can park day. Close to the main road. There are rubbish bins and a source of drinking water. Gas stations next to where to refuel.

title: (20690) Elgeta - 2 Domingo Iturbe Kalea
description: Parking to spend the night without problems and with spectacular views, yes, it does not have many accesses to water or things like this but the town has everything, hiking, mountain biking, road cycling, the welcoming town, good food and good people Without a doubt to return! Eskerrik Asko!

title: (48278) Markina-Xemein - 3 Iturreta Auzoa
description: Very nice place, next to a beautiful, quiet and with space to park more than one vehicle. We have spent the afternoon here after touring the area. Possibility of spending the night in a magical environment, we had to leave due to logistics.

title: (48144) Plaza - 4 San Isidro Kalea
description: Air-conditioned area for 6 motorhomes, with services: free drinking water; free gray and black water emptying. Nearby public toilets (200m), grocery store and 3 bars. Village square 150 m away with children's play area. In the heart of the Gorbea Natural Park, ideal for mountain biking and hiking. It also has a bike wash area. CLOSED FOR THE LIVESTOCK FAIR THE NEAREST WEEKEND TO SAN ISIDRO (May 15).

name: SpeedQueen Lavandería

description: Camping restaurant TXORI ERROTA good food, very cheap Regarding the surroundings 946254376 Very good food and cheap. It is not a motorhome area. The ad would have been put by the owner.

title: (20600) Eibar - 911 Via Arrate
description: Small park with parking for about 20 vehicles, picnic area with tables and a fountain. On the outskirts of Eíbar.

title: (48382) Mendata - 13A Lugar Barrio Olabe
description: Parking for small vehicle type van on a small village square with water nearby. Very quiet places despite some dogs.

title: (48142) Gaztelu-Elexabeitia - 48003 Herriko Plaza
description: Artea gas station. Possibility of washing the camper. It can be used to empty gray water. There is a bathroom (I don't know if they allow sewage to be emptied). They sell gas, big bottles. Nearby is the Gorbeia Natural Park.

title: (20600) Eibar - 8 Mandiola Balle Aldea
description: Gravel parking for vans and motorhomes, in front of the park for children and picnic areas. Next door is a restaurant.

title: (20690) Elgeta - Pateittitik Asentziorako Bidea

title: (20600) Eibar - 9 Polonia Etxeberria Kalea
description: Free parking outside, quiet to sleep in van.

title: (48278) Markina-Xemein - 4B Iluntzar Auzoa
description: Petrol station with water supply

title: (48142) Gaztelu-Elexabeitia - 44C Herriko Plaza
description: Recreational area of Santamañe. It has a barbecue, four tables and a fountain. There are slides for the little ones.

title: (20690) Elgeta - 73 Goio Asentzio Auzoa Auzoa
description: Very nice and nice place, with tables, fountain and barbecues.

title: (48144) - N-240
description: Parking for various excursions by bike or on foot.

title: (48278) Barinaga - 4A Barinaga Auzoa
description: We were looking for a place to eat and rest. We have found this car park in the sun but the man at the bar has recommended us to park in the shade seen in another photo. It is a town of 4 houses with flat parking, next to a small river where you can soak your feet and there is a swing park and an area for tables and barbecues. Very happy with how the man at the bar has treated us, who has taught us everything, we have eaten well and rested

title: (48144) Undurraga - 38 Undurraga Auzoa
description: Grijo parking next to the road for 3 coaches. Next to green area and river. The road is quiet, hardly any cars pass.

title: (20600) Eibar - 6W Lugar Mandiola Balle
description: Picnic area with several tables and fountain. Very quiet and shaded place. Plain and good way to arrive. From here you can make several excursions, for example to Mount Kalamua, from where there are spectacular views.

title: (01160) Ibarra - 1 Eguzkierripa Auzoa
description: There is a small space to park next to the hermitage of Ibabe. There is a covered barbecue, drinking fountain, latrine and good shade with picnic tables. At most a motorhome or a couple of vans fits.

title: (48392) Múgica o Ugarte - 6 Barrio San Román
title_short: (48392) Múgica o Ugarte - 6 Barrio San Román
description: Area with tables to eat, children's area, fountain and easy parking. ideal to rest and eat calmly

title: (48382) Mendata - 37 Olabe Auzoa
description: Small land in the forest on the side of a small asphalt road (ok for a camper but be careful for the 1/2 turn I advise less, we were in van and it was perfect). No absolute quiet passage, in the morning we saw only 2 people dog sled, happy to say hello, magic.

title: (01160) Ibarra - 2 Iturrizuri Kalea
description: Perfect place to park and spend the night, it is located next to the road and next to the town

title: (48383) -
description: Church parking lot. calm, the mountain road is close but very little traffic. charming church, trees around the parking lot, birds are singing.

title: (48210) Otxandio - 33B Urigoiena Kalea

description: Quiet parking

description: Picnic area with water, tables and public toilets.

title: (20600) Arrate - 1Z Lugar Arrate Balle
description: Arrate sanctuary-parking and picnic area. Space with tables, bathrooms, barbecues, bar / restaurant, children's playground and exit for mountain and mountain bike excursions.

title: (48300) Gernika-Lumo - 2 Txanporta Industrialdea
description: Parking in an industrial area, next to the Eroski hypermarket and the Repsol gas station. In the hypermarket there is laundry with self-service. 10 minutes walk from the center of Gernika.

title: (48270) Marquina-Jeméin - 23B Avenida Xemein
description:
Large carpark beside a church/graveyard and a college across the road. It has some shade.
This carpark was empty in August but that may not be the case during college term.
There are no services.

title: (48270) Markina-Xemein - 4 Azpiko-Errota Kalea
description: Ample parking. Water fountain near by

title: (48143) Areatza - Gorbearako Errepidea

title: (01169) Ibarra - Olaeta Entitatea
description: Quiet place next to a road with very little traffic. Terrain with some unevenness although there are some flat areas. The signal of coverage is bad.

title: (48300) Gernika-Lumo - Lapurdi Kalea
description: Parking in the city, self-service, direct access to the center. There are a few cafes in the area. The parking lot is very suitable for exploring Gernika by bike or on foot.

title: (48270) Markina-Xemein - 24f Beko Benta Kalea
description: It is the parking lot of the soccer field of the town, we spent the afternoon super quiet. If you go up to the village there is a toilet with a shower in the first building on the left.

title: (48144) Ubide - 134C Lugar Barrio Altzusta
description: Quiet place next to a telecommunications tower. High area with beautiful views. The road is paved right up to the arrival at the site. There are trees that touch the height of the motorhome along the way.

title: (48145) Ubidea - 50 Madalen Auzoa
description: Just off the road, under the trees with a table and two concrete benches, a stream and greenery. Ideal for a lunch break, not tested at night. No services

title: (48143) Areatza - 8 Pagomakurre Bidea
description: Parking 2 km before the one above. Tables, bathrooms, fountain and barbecues. Choose the site well for the ACs because there are stones that limit the length.

title_short: (48300) Gernika-Lumo - 65 Fray Martin de Murua Kalea

description: 43 ° 18'41.25 "N 02 ° 40'34.32" W A large car park accessible from Calle Ibarra near Erosky center. Convenient to go to the city center nearby. Not suitable for big jigs.

title: (48300) Gernika-Lumo - 25 Bekoibarra Kalea
description: Parking area in the polygon 5 minutes from the center on foot. Motorhomes do not fit in the nearby parking lot. A neighbor in the area has recommended us to come here. Wide area, without parking problems and with shade.

title: (20870) Elgoibar - 29W Kalea Valle Idotorbe
description: Picnic area with enough spaces for parking and within a woodland. It has tables and benches, litter bins, toilets and sinks, BBQ, playground, containers for recycling, exhaust of marked mountain trails, a chapel; bar/restaurant, and pediment.

title_short: (01169) Ibarra - De Leguitano a Mondragon Por Aramaio

address.street: De Leguitano a Mondragon Por Aramaio

description: Car parking and AC. if it measures more than 6m, it must be left on a sideways battery. If not, it is high season, there are not many people and parking like this does not bother you. next to the center and everything there is to see. parks nearby.

title: (48300) Gernika-Lumo - 7002 Kalea Angel Allende Salazar

title: (48143) - 1B Paraje Pagomakurre
description: Parking that starts one of the ascents of Mount Gorbea, we spent a magnificent night and quiet, there are many parking places for cars and vans (California / tranporter type ..) for camper from 6-6: 30 and caravans a little less but approximately 10-12 holes, there are bathrooms, a picnic area, a fountain and public toilets. To get there, the road is narrow and mountain, so without rushing the climb I recommend the site to start the climb soon.

title: (48145) Ubidea - 47 Madalen Auzoa

title: (20500) Arrasate - 909 Lugar Barrio Musakola
description: Nice quiet place next to the village and next to the Burger King there. From the AP1 exit Arreseta. We couldn't find a stopping place along the AP1 and turned off haphazardly. That turned out to be a good choice.

title: (48144) Ubidea - Unnamed Road
description:
Perfect quiet nature spot next to a little stream.  Just before the border of the natural park.
Accessible via an unpaved road in good condition. (via Ubide).

title: (48195) Larrabetzu - 4 Lehendakari Agirre Kalea
description: Parking near the center and quiet. Very beautiful city with an atmosphere. Spend a night, it's great. They say nothing to spend the night.

title: (48320) Guernica - Lorategieta Etxetaldea
description: Parking day and night the police say nothing very good town

title: (48195) Larrabetzu - 15 Goikola Auzoa
description: Area open at the end of March 2021. Draining of black and gray water, and a tap with good drinking water pressure. A few meters away are the 5 places. The center of Larrabetzu is about 350 m away. About 200m there are bins.

title: (48960) Galdakao - 8 Altamira Auzoa
description: A quiet area near Bilbao to spend the night, it is following a dirt road as it passes a Picnic area already listed in another ad, there is a small dirt esplanade with space for two Vans but I don't know how it will get on, we with the Van without problem. Some good views but ordinary. Inside the van no noise is heard but outside the road is heard and a bit of noise in the background but not much. We slept peacefully and no one bothered us. Keep it clean.

title: (48960) Gumuzio - BI-3732
description: Picnic area with barbecue. Walk possible in the trenches in the forest.

title: (48300) Gernika-Lumo - 6A Kortezubi Bidea
description: Parking spaces with public bathroom, about 15 minutes walk from the center of Guernica. You can park both campers and AC, since the spaces are quite long. We have come with a 6m camper. There is a free public toilet next door. There is no water to empty or fill, but there is a water source nearby. The only drawback is that the road is next to it, so you can hear the cars passing by.

title: (20590) Soraluze - 5A Ezozia, Barrio Auzoa
description: Nice place to rest and spend time, summertime shadowy, there is a bar closed to where you can provide.

title: (48300) Guernica-Luno - Erreka Egala Ibilbidea
description: Very quiet free parking

title: (48391) Vizcaya - 13 Zabala-Belendiz Auzoa
description: Small ermita lost in the middle of the forest where we spent the night It is peaceful and a good stop if you want to avoid the touristic coast around.

title: (48145) Biscay - 38A Lugar Barrio Jon Deuna
description: Olalde hostel/hut. Picnic tables, bbq pit, and a river. There was also an RV that had been there for 2days. There is a number on the door you can call to stay inside as well. Great town with nice bars and entry to Gorbea national park.

title: (20500) Arrasate -
description: Gas station and service area. It offers gray and black drain (although with a grid that makes it unhygienic). Drinking water refill too.

title: (20500) Arrasate - 10D San Andres Auzoa Auzoa
description: Vehicle washing facilities. A pressure washing station (shampoo, tires, brush, wax ...) for large vehicles.

title: (48300) Gernika-Lumo - 52 Carlos Gangoiti Kalea
description: Parking and stay overnight for free, 800 m. From the center well located at the entrance to Gernika.

title: (48142) Gaztelu-Elexabeitia - 35 Orozko-Areatza Errepidea
description: Great place for a night or 2 ... No services. There are garbage cans, so to ... Keep the place clean for others.

title: (20570) Bergara - 13 Goiauzoa
description: San Martzial. Place with a hermitage, with drinking water fountains, picnic tables and a playground. Shading.

title: (48144) Ubide - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in the middle of the Gorbeia park, very quiet and beautiful. It is worth going to visit and do some route.

title: (20570) Bergara - 4 Antxiturri Kalea
description: Supermarket parking, one area with a height limit and another not, we had no problem spending the day.

title: (20590) Gipuzkoa - 18 Ezozia, Barrio Auzoa
description: Calm place, fountain beside Road going Up, some tablets and chairs, as well in fountain and Up the park.

title: (48410) Areatza - Unnamed Road
description: Parking and recreation area Altzagorta. Beautiful, steep road to access. Super calm among the herds. Many picnic tables. Indicated by the tourist office of Orosko.

title: (20870) Elgoibar - 1 Zizilion Kalea
description: Parking in an industrial zone. It has a supermarket and a bar-restaurant. 5 minutes walk from the historic center of the town. Level. 6 meter vehicles, ok. Longer ... complicated. Good site for a visit to Elgoibar.

title: (20570) Bergara - 15W Ibiltokia Boni Laskurain
description: Very close to the center.

title: (48393) Landaberde - 4 Lugar Barrio Armotxerri
description: Hermitage with drinking water fountain and swings for children Unfortunately, the car parks are now blocked with bollards.

title: (48115) Morga - 1 BI-2713
description: In the middle of the forest, a very quiet farmer's path next to a small river. The path is a bit bumpy.

title: (48960) Elexalde Auzoa - 49 Elexalde Auzoa
description: Car parking in the school and sports area. Large and little occupation. We stayed 1 night because we were caught passing through. Great cider house 100 meters

title: (20570) Bergara - 2-4 Telleria Kalea
description: Área para Autocaravanas-marked area on hard ground between a work road and a stream in the Labegaraieta industrial park, south of the centre. No shade and not always quiet during the day. Simple VE option with floor inlet at the ramp. Accessible across the river via a bridge. There is a playground with climbing frames, scate track, water fountain and descent to the river. Be careful with children on the parking side, very high steep river. Sign with points of interest and route is in the parking lot. With a payment of € 5 you can therefore get services such as a discount at a spa and on bus tickets.

title: (20870) Elgoibar - 24 Azkue Bailara
description: Large and spacious parking next to the football field with bar and source. It also has a playground and machines for adults in the open air, and basketball court. The area is also wooded and 5-10 minutes walk from the Centre of Elgoibar. There are bathrooms and bar to be next to the Sports Centre, when it is open. From here the highway is a little heard.

title: (20570) Bergara - 10 Ibargarai Hiribidea
description: Laundry

title: (20590) Soraluze - San Andres Auzoa / Barrio
description: Space in the nature with a magnificent view of the valley, with a small playground, a pediment and a source. Following the road to the mountain, you will arrive at the car park which starts the route of the dolmens

title: (20540) Eskoriatza - 0A Antontxu Bidea
description: Fuel, bakery and services of Black Water. They also sell gas, liquids for camper Wc and toilet paper.

title: (48960) Galdakao - 51 Bizkai Kalea
description: It is a municipal sports center. In the same entrance street there is a bakery and a pharmacy. There is access to showers. Very clean and practical.

title: (20540) Eskoriatza - 12 Aingeru Guarda Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Small free water fountain

title: (01170) Legutio -
description:
A space on the side of the road, with little traffic on a rainy day and by the lake
stop for lunch, the nights seem rather calm here!
in the middle of nature and flat
no prohibition sign

title: (48960) Galdakao - 7d Txomin Egileor Kalea
description: It's the parking lot right next to the skate park. A quiet place to spend the night, it has a fountain and a container to throw the garbage. Near the town and the train station (euskotren).

title: (48315) Kortezubi - 7BIS Lugar Barrio Enderika
description: Parking without prohibition to spend the night. We spent the night, there was another van. Some moments of the voices of the kids after the party as well as the noise of the cars.

title: (48309) Errigoiti - 16B Lugar Barrio Metxika
description: Pretty parking of a church next to a playground and a soccer field.

title: (48960) Galdakao - 12 Kalea Hermano Victor
description: Free parking located next to the football field. Next to the street but quiet.

title: (48309) Errigoiti - 17 Zallobante Auzoa
description: Very quiet, fairly level parking lot, next to a road with little traffic. However, in the center of the village. There are local dogs barking and the church ringing but very quiet place. Benches, barbecue area and water available.

title: (20550) Arechavaleta - 2 Aozaraza
description: Day and night parking

title: (01170) Legutio -
description: A beautiful place in the forest, no possibility of turning around, you can park on the beach if the lake is not too high and if you are brave with a high enough vehicle, calm not too much passage on the ideal route for one night

title: (48315) Kortezubi - 1A Lugar Barrio Basondo
description: Parking in front of a restaurant, 100 meters from the road where you have to start walking to see the Oma forest, there are several vans and cars and the restaurant owners have told us that we can spend the night without problems. There is room to spare is beautiful, quiet, in the middle of nature, burritos attached to the parking fence.

title: (48315) Kortezubi - 8 Basondo Auzoa
description: Very quiet in a public parking lot, spectacular setting. There is a zoo called Basondo at 300 m, the Oma valley in Trekin and Ibarrola, forest to visit.

title: (48419) - 10B Lugar Barrio Urigoiti
description: Beautiful place with parking to go to the mountain.

title: (48314) - 7 Zelaieta Kalea
description:
Parking at the entrance to the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve Bird Watching Center.
Maximum parking time 48 hours.

title: (48314) Gautegiz-Arteagako - 7 Orueta Auzoa
description: Elongated hard shoulder at the end of a dead end street. On the right is a meadow, on the left a large hedge.. so it's pretty quiet, except for the dogs barking from the surrounding houses. Good for spending a night there. Space for approx. 4 motorhomes.

title: (20870) San Lorentzo - 35 Sallobente-Ermuaran Bailara
description: Neighborhood with water, bathrooms, games area, bowling, to hang out and rest. It has three tables, one of them double.

title: (20540) Eskoriatza - 3 Mendiola Elizatea Auzoa
description: Natural public car park (not an official car park) enjoyed by the few residents in Mendiola. It's a bit lopsided. It is a quiet place with beautiful views and a source of drinking water. Next to it there are signs indicating different routes that can be done, such as the route to the Urkulu reservoir or to the Kurtzebarri mountain. Nearby, a couple of minutes walk, there are rubbish bins (at the small roundabout with the stone religious statue). It's optional but I introduced myself to the neighbors and asked if they minded if I stayed there. There are so few houses there that talking to neighbors and introducing yourself is always a good option. It's a quiet and clean place so please let's keep it that way.

title: (48314) Basque - 2 Gaztelubide Kalea
description: Parking on the coast of a precious park to rest and play.

title: (01138) - Urtegieta Kalea
description: Asphalted parking with 2 well-kept portable toilets. The picnic area is before passing the river and the area for overnight after (easy river to pass). Perfect to spend the night and climb the mountain gorbea or cave. PS: the ascent from the village of murua is a paved road with socabones. Caution to cant with long vehicles.

title: (01138) Araba - Urtegieta Kalea
description: Beautiful tranquil spot visited only by a few locals and hikers. There is a grand parking just 100m down the road, but this spot has much better views. It is a large picknick area and starting point for hikes into the natural park. You may wake up to see ponies with cow bells grazing next to your camper. Trash containers and dixie toilets present, water from a natural stream nearby. Not recommended for low riding campers due to high speed bumps on the access road.

title: (48419) Ibarra - 24B Lugar Barrio Ibarra
description: Tiny and authentic Basque town. Perfect if it rains because it has many covered tables. Quiet zone. Attached to a quiet road. Hermitage and small river. Cool.

title: (20550) Aretxabaleta - 14 Goroeta Elizaurrea Auzoa
description: Parking next to the road but almost no cars. There are toilets and from there start the mountain bike routes and hiking. Very quiet. There are wooden tables in full sun, but there is also place in the shade.

title: (48960) Galdakao - 4A Vivero Errepidea
description: Large car park surrounded by nature, picnic area and bar. Perfect for biking, walking with children and with dogs.

title: (48410) Orozko - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place to spend the night. It is the beginning of several excursions. There are about 20 parking spaces. There is not the slightest noise. The road to get here is narrow but sufficient, although it has very steep slopes.

title: (48710) Berriatua - 5 Plaza Urepel Plaza
description: Classic car park about 15 spaces. Small square with drinking water fountain. Bar nearby

title: (48710) Berriatúa -
description: Parking of the village soccer field. There is a fountain where the people of the town come to fill carafes of water. Quiet place for small vans on the side of the road. We have stopped to eat but we have not spent the night. But a van of less than 6 meters is no problem to spend the night. You have to keep in mind that if there is a match, it will be full.

title: (48394) Murueta - 3B Lugar Barrio Goierria
description: Restaurant parking with ample parking area. We parked one afternoon to rest among the trees and had no problems. Without services for AC, only restaurant and recycling area.

title: (01170) Legutio - 9B Kalea San Roque
description: Parking 5 minutes from the town square. It has no toilet or water but it is very quiet and a festive place without problems. Bars and supermarket 3 minutes.

title: (48288) Ispaster -
description: A space at the end of a 30m path in the middle of nature

title: (48288) Kortezubi - 15A Lugar Barrio Mendazona
description: At the end of a track with tall grass and less than 500 m accessible to 4x4, there is an abandoned house and an electrical transformer. This place leaves the possibility of turning around. The access path offers lovely views of the surrounding mountains.

title: (48288) Ispaster - 5C Lugar Barrio Barainka
description: Free parking, surrounded by a eucalyptus forest. no service, quiet night.

title: (48394) Murueta - 23 Lugar Barrio Goierria
description: Shaded roadside parking. Only suitable for smaller caravans, as turning in the street is necessary. There is another car park below, but this is separated by a 2.2m height limit (temporarily open). Some small parts fall from the trees, 50m away trains honk as they pass by, I only spent the lunch break here.

title: (48288) Soluan Auzoa -
description: Off the road in eucalyptus forest, a densely overgrown path, a short bump on an unpaved path to a spacious spot in the middle of the forest. Overlooking the biscaja.

title: (48114) Arrieta - 25 Landaguren Auzoa
description: Area with 2 tables, a barbecue and a fountain with drinking water. Very quiet place for day and night without traffic. Very good views in natural surroundings.

title: (20569) Oñati - 14 Torreauzo Auzoa
description: Alternative parking to the main one to go for a swim in the nearby pools. Very calm. there is a company next door so it may not be usable on weekdays. Saturday was very quiet (alone).

title: (20577) Bergara - 39 Elosu Auzoa Auzoa
description: Parking of a recreational facility with picnic tables. Isolated place in the mountains by the roadside.

title: (48970) Basauri - Ibarreta Auzoa
description: Free parking next to the river, quiet, with free open bathroom, bins...perfect to spend the day/night near the center of Basauri

title: (48289) Ugaran - 13B Lugar Barrio Ugaran
description: Ample parking, next to the river

title: (20850) Mendaro - 33 Andoneikua Hiribidea
description: After much research found a parking at the bottom of a dead end. Do not arrive too early because many cars parked on waking. Quiet place just for one night.

title: (48480) Arrigorriaga - 10C Cristo Zeharkalea
description: Ample asphalt parking. Several squares, quiet place. Possibility of motorhome. We slept one night and it was great.

title: (01170) Legutio - 7 Calle de Gurutzalde
description: Parking spaces next to the lake, next to a quiet urbanization. greetings!

title: (20569) Oñate - 15W Barrio Zañartu
description: Parking area next to the usako bathing area! Magnificent area to spend a summer day

title: (48450) Etxebarri - Unnamed Road
description: Nice picnic area with many tables and barbecue areas, it also has a source of drinking water, garbage and a small stream. With an incredible viewpoint, perfect to spend the day or even the night. The access is almost all paved, except the last section that is unpaved, but it can be accessed without problem.

title: (01170) Legutio - 6 Zabalain Kalea
description: Parking several places day and night. Quiet location overlooking the water on both sides of the road.

title: (48289) Vizcaya - Barrio de Ugarán
description: Free water next to the tire pressure in the station.

title: (20569) Oñate - 15 Barrio Zañartu
description: Natural pools with fountain and 2 showers. Parking in the surroundings.

title: (48480) Arrigorriaga - BI-3723
description: Very large parking lot. A few meters from Mendikosolo. A small lake with barbecues, pedal boats, swings and a restaurant.

title: (01170) Legutio - 5 Madala Kalea
description: Parking on the street, very quiet urbanization, perfect to make a stop and rest for a few hours, even one night as we have spent. Easy parking and little movement in the area. Nearby the lake, since the other location marked by the app has signs prohibiting camping.

title: (48289) Amoroto - BI-2405
description: Parking without prohibition, we spent the night there without problem. The road nearby a bit noisy, trash in the parking lot.

title: (20569) Oñati - 26A Garagaltza Auzoa Auzoa
description: Drinking water source.
